title: League Of Legends missing files...
body:
I have missing files in league of legends and when i launch it,the badge shows up and then dissapears without launching the launcher... :(
So can u send me on skype,mediafire and etc. your LoL files so i can run LoL...


I will be so thankful! :) Bye have a great day. <3
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body: Hmmmm sending those files over skype wouldn't be the best way to repair your client. Let's try running our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) with the reinstall option selected to get that client all fixed up.
